item.title: 印度国营炼油企业不顾美国批评加紧购买俄罗斯石油
item.description: 印度的国营炼油厂在短暂暂停后又重新开始购买俄罗斯石油，尽管这个南亚国家面临着更高的贸易关税和特朗普官员的严厉批评。【原文：India’s state-run refiners have returned to buying Russian oil after a brief pause, despite the South Asian nation facing higher tariffs for the trade and a volley of criticism from Trump officials.】

item.title: 人工智能需求激增，泰国数据中心容量或增至三倍
item.description: 随着约 65 亿美元的投资涌入数据中心行业，泰国的数据中心容量预计将在未来三年内增加两倍，以满足对云计算和人工智能激增的需求。【原文：Thailand’s data center capacity is expected to triple in the next three years as investments of about $6.5 billion pour into the sector to meet surging demand for cloud computing and artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 肯尼亚与日本就日元贷款条款达成一致，而非武士协议
item.description: 在之前的武士债券计划被搁置之后，肯尼亚政府和日本政府就日元贷款的条件达成了一致。【原文：The governments of Kenya and Japan agreed on the terms of a yen loan after earlier plans for a Samurai bond were shelved.】

item.title: Canva 开始以 420 亿美元估值出售股票，迈向 IPO 之路
item.description: Canva 公司以 420 亿美元的估值启动了员工股票销售，标志着这家澳大利亚设计软件初创公司的价值大幅跃升，该公司正将增长的赌注押在人工智能上。【原文：Canva Inc. launched an employee stock sale at a valuation of $42 billion, marking a significant leap in value for the Australian design software startup that’s betting on artificial intelligence for growth.】

item.title: 特朗普盟友呼吁邦迪调查美联储库克的抵押贷款问题
item.description: 联邦住房金融局主任正敦促司法部长帕姆-邦迪（Pam Bondi）就两笔抵押贷款对美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）进行调查，这是特朗普政府加强对民主党人士和任命人员进行法律审查的一系列举措中的最新举措。【原文：The director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency is urging Attorney General Pam Bondi to investigate Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook over a pair of mortgages, the latest in a series of moves by the Trump administration to increase legal scrutiny of Democratic figures and appointees.】

item.title: 期权交易员发出信号：港元波动只是暂时的
item.description: 根据期权定价，借贷成本上升导致的港元波动率飙升可能是短暂的。【原文：A spike in Hong Kong dollar volatility due to higher borrowing costs may prove to be short-lived, according to option pricing.】

item.title: 贝森特警告将征收更多关税，印度股市或将结束四日连涨势头
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: OpenAI-Challenger Manus 预计年收入达 9000 万美元
item.description: 人工智能先驱 Manus 背后的这家由中国人创办的公司表示，它预计年收入将达到 9000 万美元，这让人们对其业务价值有了初步了解。【原文：The Chinese-founded company behind AI pioneer Manus said it’s forecast an annual revenue run rate of $90 million, offering a first glimpse at the value of its business.】

item.title: 唐山钢铁减产不及预期，铁矿石下跌
item.description: 铁矿石连续第六天下跌，原因是有迹象表明，中国在主要炼钢中心减产的努力所产生的影响小于预期。【原文：Iron ore fell for a sixth day on signs that Chinese efforts to cut production in a major steelmaking hub are having less impact than anticipated.】

item.title: 贸易协议达成后中国对美稀土永磁出口创六个月新高
item.description: 作为与华盛顿达成的贸易休战协议的一部分，中国同意实现出口正常化，此后，7 月份中国流向美国的稀土永磁材料继续恢复，月出口量同比增长 76%。【原文：China’s flows of rare-earth magnets to the US continued to recover in July — with volumes rising 76% month-on-month — after Beijing agreed to normalize exports as part of its trade truce with Washington.】

item.title: 世界两大矿商就铜矿项目与特朗普会面
item.description: 全球最大的两家矿业公司的首席执行官与唐纳德-特朗普总统会面，讨论一个铜矿项目，该项目可在未来几十年内满足美国四分之一的需求。【原文：The chief executive officers of the world’s two biggest mining companies met President Donald Trump to discuss a copper project that could supply the US with a quarter of its demand for decades to come.】

item.title: 中国将通过大修解决石化产能过剩问题
item.description: 中国政府将对石化和炼油行业进行全面改革，逐步淘汰小型设施，对落后业务进行升级，同时将投资转向先进材料。【原文：The Chinese government is set to launch a sweeping overhaul of its petrochemicals and oil refining sector, phasing out smaller facilities and targeting outdated operations for upgrades, while redirecting investment to advanced materials.】

item.title: 中国股市涨势扩大，动能增强
item.description: 中国股市的涨势正在蔓延，继续上行的迹象不断显现。【原文：Chinese equities’ rally is spreading out, with signs of further upside continuing to emerge.】

item.title: 中国创纪录游戏《黑色神话：悟空传》再添续集
item.description: Game Science 是去年最大的新角色扮演游戏之一《黑色神话：钟馗》背后的初创公司，该公司正在开发该系列的后续游戏《黑色神话：钟馗》。【原文：Game Science, the startup behind one of last year’s biggest new role-playing games, is working on a successor in the series, Black Myth: Zhong Kui.】

item.title: 新西兰央行发出进一步降息信号以重振低迷经济
item.description: 新西兰央行将利率降至三年来的最低点，并发出进一步宽松的信号，称经济已经停滞。当地美元下跌。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank cut interest rates to a three-year low and signaled further easing, saying the economy has stalled. The local dollar fell.】

item.title: 收益率走高吸引买家，中国债券走势渐趋平缓
item.description: 分析师说，随着收益率上升到一些投资者可能认为具有吸引力的水平附近，中国债券的抛售可能暂时降温，这使得中国债券在亚洲表现排名中接近垫底。【原文：The selloff in Chinese bonds that sent them to near the bottom of Asia’s performance rankings is likely to cool for now as yields rise to near levels which some investors may perceive as attractive, analysts say.】

item.title: 软银集团股价扩大跌幅，因美国科技股低迷受到影响
item.description: 软银集团股份有限公司（SoftBank Group Corp. ）股价连续第二日下跌，此前美国科技股大幅下挫，对该公司投资英特尔公司（Intel Corp.【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. shares fell for a second day, following a sharp selloff in US technology shares and as concerns over its investment in Intel Corp. continued to weigh on the company.】

item.title: 阿波罗寻求在信贷繁荣期将印度资产翻番至 40 亿美元
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.）计划在未来三年内将其在印度的管理资产增加一倍，达到 40 亿美元，因为该公司希望利用印度蓬勃发展的私人信贷市场；这一市场的开放也吸引了其他全球巨头。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. plans to double its assets under management in India to $4 billion over the next three years, as it looks to capitalize on the booming private credit market — an opening also attracting other global giants.】

item.title: 巴克莱支持的巴伦乔伊公司因债券市场波动而利润飙升
item.description: 由于债券市场的波动及其新设的阿布扎比办事处推动了这家澳大利亚投资银行的业绩，巴伦乔伊公司的利润激增。【原文：Barrenjoey’s profit surged as bond market volatility and its new Abu Dhabi office boosted performance at the Australian investment bank.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行总部翻修费用爆棚，超过行长预期
item.description: 澳大利亚中央银行悉尼总部 22 层楼的大修工程耗资约 12 亿澳元（约合 7.74 亿美元），几乎是最初估算的五倍。【原文：Australia’s central bank is facing an estimated A$1.2 billion ($774 million) overhaul of its 22-story Sydney head office — almost five times the original estimate — after the discovery of widespread asbestos turned a simple refurbishment into a near total rebuild.】

item.title: 鲍威尔讲话可能提供利率线索，黄金在讲话前保持跌势
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔本周晚些时候发表重要讲话之前，黄金保持小幅下跌。【原文：Gold held a small decline ahead of a key address by Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell later this week, which may give fresh clues on the central bank’s monetary path.】

item.title: 詹姆斯-哈迪（James Hardie）利润下滑，股价创 2020 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 澳大利亚建材制造商詹姆斯-哈迪工业公司（James Hardie Industries Plc）称其季度利润下滑，股价创下五年来最大跌幅。【原文：James Hardie Industries Plc shares tumbled the most in five years after the Australian building materials maker said its quarterly profit sank.】

item.title: 莫迪称赞与中国的关系，贝森特抨击印度富裕家庭
item.description: 在美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特因南亚国家购买俄罗斯石油而对其批评升级之际，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪对改善与中国的关系表示欢迎。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi welcomed improved ties with China as US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent escalated criticism of the South Asian nation over its purchases of Russian oil.】

item.title: 涨幅达 230% 的中国电子商务股面临盈利考验
item.description: 本周，一家中国电子商务公司的惊人涨势将面临关键考验，该公司的财报将揭示其在中国政府打压教育行业后是否取得了成功。【原文：A Chinese e-commerce stock’s stunning rally faces a key test this week, with earnings set to shed light on the success of its pivot away from education following Beijing’s crackdown.】

item.title: 关税之痛加深，日本出口创四年来最大降幅
item.description: 由于美国关税继续对全球商业造成压力，日本出口创下四年多来的最大跌幅，在个人消费仍不稳定的情况下，经济增长前景蒙上阴影。【原文：Japan’s exports sustained their steepest drop in more than four years as US tariffs continued to weigh on global commerce, clouding the outlook for economic growth at a time when personal spending remains unsteady.】

item.title: 香港交易所因首次公开募股热潮而实现创纪录盈利
item.description: 受首次公开募股和交易繁荣的推动，香港交易及结算所有限公司（Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Ltd.）预计将连续第二个季度实现创纪录的利润。【原文：Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Ltd. is estimated to post a record profit for the second straight quarter, buoyed by an initial public offering and trading boom.】

item.title: 行业报告指出美国库存减少，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 在一份报告显示美国库存下降后，石油价格趋于稳定，同时投资者对乌克兰-俄罗斯停战谈判的前景进行了权衡。【原文：Oil steadied after a report signaled a decline in US stockpiles, while investors weighed the outlook for Ukraine-Russia truce talks.】

item.title: 软银 470 亿美元人工智能股票涨势面临停滞风险
item.description: 软银集团股份有限公司（SoftBank Group Corp. ）的股价在经历了本月的反弹后，上行空间似乎有限，周一创下历史新高，增加了超过 7 万亿日元（约合 470 亿美元）。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. shares look to have limited upside after the rally this month that added more than ¥7 trillion ($47 billion) to an all-time high Monday.】

item.title: 白宫推出 TikTok 账户，美国销售情况尚不确定
item.description: 白宫于周二推出了自己的 TikTok 账户，这是唐纳德-特朗普总统继续寻求从中国公司字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd.）手中出售该社交视频应用美国业务时发出的最新支持信号。【原文：The White House launched its own TikTok account on Tuesday, the latest signal of support as President Donald Trump continues to seek a sale of the social video app’s US operations from Chinese company ByteDance Ltd.】

item.title: 美国科技股下滑，亚洲股市承压：市场综述
item.description: 在大型科技股大跌拖累华尔街走低之后，亚洲股市将迎来一个低迷的开局。【原文：Asian stocks are poised for a sluggish start after a selloff in big tech dragged Wall Street lower.】
